rmA.dsc: <p><strong>2 Twin Beds</strong></p><p>345-sq-foot room with city views </p><br/><p><b>Layout</b> - Bedroom </p><p><b>Internet</b> - Free WiFi and wired Internet access</p><p><b>Entertainment</b> - Cable channels and iPod dock </p><p><b>Food & Drink</b> - Refrigerator, minibar, coffee/tea maker, and 24-hour room service</p><p><b>Sleep</b> - Premium bedding, blackout drapes/curtains, turndown service, and bed sheets </p><p><b>Bathroom</b> - Private bathroom, bathtub or shower, bathrobes, and slippers</p><p><b>Practical</b> - Safe, free newspaper, and iron/ironing board; rollaway/extra beds and free cribs/infant beds available on request</p><p><b>Comfort</b> - Climate-controlled air conditioning and daily housekeeping</p><p><b>Accessibility</b> - Transfer shower, wheelchair accessible, height-adjustable showerhead, grab bar near toilet, closed-captioned TV, low-height view port in door, low-height counter and sink, and lever door handles</p><p>Smoking</p><p>Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability </p>

rmA.dsc: <p><strong>1 King Bed</strong></p><p><b>Internet</b> - Free WiFi and wired Internet access</p><p><b>Entertainment</b> - Cable channels and iPod dock </p><p><b>Food & Drink</b> - Refrigerator, minibar, coffee/tea maker, and 24-hour room service</p><p><b>Sleep</b> - Premium bedding, blackout drapes/curtains, turndown service, and bed sheets </p><p><b>Bathroom</b> - Private bathroom, bathtub or shower, bathrobes, and slippers</p><p><b>Practical</b> - Safe, free newspaper, and iron/ironing board; rollaway/extra beds and free cribs/infant beds available on request</p><p><b>Comfort</b> - Climate-controlled air conditioning and daily housekeeping</p><p><b>Accessibility</b> - Transfer shower, wheelchair accessible, height-adjustable showerhead, grab bar near toilet, closed-captioned TV, low-height view port in door, low-height counter and sink, and lever door handles</p><p>Non-Smoking</p><p>Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability </p>
